shop.title: ChipGlobe Shop
shop.description: In our ChipGlobe Web Shop you will find everything you need for a quick setup of an embedded prototype. From sensors to the creation of a secure connection to the transfer to the Amazon Cloud (AWS = Amazon Web Services), including access to application articles. ChipGlobe is a 'Preferred Infineon Partner' in the Infineon ISPN network. More information is available about the ISPN. At the Infineon IoT Security Circle Europe on May 28, 2019, ChipGlobe exhibited a demonstrator and showed how hardware encryption makes transmissions more secure. The demonstrator uses building blocks of our prototyping.
